mapper.insert: insert into memo(purpose, location, writer, attendee, memo, conclusion) values(#{purpose}, #{location}, #{writer}, #{attendee}, #{memo}, #{conclusion})
mapper.update: update memo set purpose= #{purpose}, location= #{location}, writer= #{writer}, attendee= #{attendee}, memo= #{memo}, conclusion= #{conclusion} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM memo where writer like #{filter} OR memo like #{filter}
SELECT * FROM memo where memo like #{filter}
SELECT * FROM memo where writer like #{filter}
